item.description:
A Beatles tribute band on the Windsor Town Greeen. Bring a chair or blanket and some food or drink.

 

 

Concert on the Green Postponed until Tuesday!     Don't miss the rescheduled concert on Tuesday, July 31! Sponsored by: Windsor Federal Savings

It's incredible that after more than 40 years, the timeless music of the Beatles continues to touch multiple generations of music lovers - which is one of the reasons why Connecticut's premiere Beatles tribute band, "Beatles Forever" is such an attraction. The music of the Beatles appeals to listeners of all ages! Relying on the most dance-oriented selection of classics from the entire Fab Four catalogue, "Beatles Forever" recreates the sound, excitement and energy of the Beatles at any type of event.

"Beatles Forever" features five talented musicians from Greater Hartford, Connecticut. Guitarists Terry Miggins and Dan Leduc , Phil Clapis on keyboards and percussion, Jerry Clapis on bass, and Vinnie Castellano on drums provide the spot on vocals and full instrumentation that captures every nuance of the Beatles' classic hits. Their ability to engage any audience, combined with their note perfect reproductions, will set the atmosphere for fun and bring out the best at any gathering!
item.name: Beatles Forever
